description: The problem is a RuntimeError caused by the set function. When the program attempts to set a variable to a given value, the set function fails to execute correctly and instead throws a RuntimeError. This RuntimeError prevents the program from setting the variable to the intended value, resulting in unexpected behavior
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 2, in <module>
TypeError: set expected at most 1 arguments, got 2
